{{Disambig}}

'''Well''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{EnvLink|Desert Well}} &ndash; a structure generated in desert biomes
* Lava Well &ndash; a structure generated in [[nether fortress]]es 
* Village Well &ndash; a structure which can generated in any type of [[village]] (except in snowy plains village) as meeting points.

=== Jokes ===
* {{EnvLink|Hash Well}} &ndash; a structure that generated in the hash biomes

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{MCD|Well}} &ndash; a [[MCD:Sub Dungeon|sub dungeon]] that spawns in {{MCD|Highblock Halls}}.

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
* {{LeStructureLink|Well of Fate}}
** {{MCL|Well of Fate (dimension)}} &ndash; a Host dimension made of prismarine present in cutscenes and the tutorial.
* {{LeStructureLink|Wellhouse}} &ndash; a player structure used as a respawn point.

== Minecraft Mini-Series ==
* Well &ndash; a location on [[Eerie Island]] where [[The Well Wisher]] dwells.
